description: Sophisticated scam where scammer claims victim is eligible for income tax refund but needs to pay processing fee or verify details first.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Income Tax Refund Approved - Rs.47,850

Dear Taxpayer, Your ITR for AY 2024-25 has been processed. You are eligible for refund of Rs.47,850. Click here to claim: [LINK] - Income Tax Department, Govt of India

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta i just saw this message on my phone... is this really for me? 47000 is big amount for retired teacher like me... i dont know how to click blue link... can you guide me how to get this money in my bank?

turns.scammer_message: Good afternoon, I am Rajesh Sharma, Income Tax Officer, CPC Bengaluru. Your refund is approved but we need to verify your bank account details. Please confirm your PAN number and account where refund should be credited.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste rajesh sir thank you for helping... i was worried... let me read details from my diary... pan is PCUPX6198K... and account number is 9903593230958... bank is pnb... i hope i typed correctly... do i need to open my google pay app to receive this or will it come directly to bank?

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for confirmation. For refund processing, there is mandatory verification fee Rs.499 (refundable). Pay to Income Tax e-Payment gateway: tax.refund.verify@paytm. This is one-time RBI mandated charge.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i understand... 499 is small amount for getting big refund... i will pay now... i opened my google pay and typed that id tax.refund.verify@paytm... but before i press pay button i want to check... what name should show on my screen? i am scared of sending money to wrong place... pls tell exact name so i can confirm and send beta

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, pay verification fee via NEFT to Account Number: 11223344556677, IFSC Code: ICIC0001122, Name: Income Tax Refund Processing Cell. Your refund Rs.47,850 will be credited within 24 hours after verification.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir thank you for this other option... neft is very confusing for me my son usually helps me with this... i will try to add this account... what if i make mistake and the money gets stuck? can you pls give me your phone number so i can call you if there is a problem beta?

turns.scammer_message: For faster processing, you may also complete verification on our secure portal: https://incometax-refund-portal.in/verify Enter your PAN, Aadhaar and pay Rs.499. For technical support call 8800112233.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste sir thank you for number... i wrote 8800112233 in my small diary... but this link you sent... i am very scared to click blue links... my son told me virus comes from there and steals money... is it really safe? i dont want to spoil my phone beta...

turns.scammer_message: Please note: This refund approval expires in 48 hours as per IT Act Section 143(1). After expiry, you'll need to file rectification request which takes 6-8 months. Email payment proof to itrefund.verification@gmail.com immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god 48 hours... i am very nervous now sir pls dont let it expire... i want to pay immediately... i am going back to google pay to use that id tax.refund.verify@paytm... i typed it and it is showing a name... pls tell me exactly what name should be there? i just want to match it so i dont send to wrong person by mistake... then i will send email to you beta
